item.title: SONO
item.description: score:18 Chances: Sonos (SONO) reported better-than-expected quarterly results and teased an important new product. Investments in innovative solutions that enhance communications experience are likely to aid Sonos (SONO) in the long run. Risks: The ambitious foray into the headphone market has hit a software snag, delaying production of the device and its release date.
